actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to establish a program of loan guarantee to enable independent refiners of crude oil to construct or acquire new or expanded refining facilities in the United States.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) National Independent Refinery Development Act - Creates the Federal Independent Refinery Financing Fund and allocates $10,000,000 to it for the use of the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration in carrying out this Act. Authorizes the Administrator to guarantee interest and unpaid balances of obligations that aid in financing construction of an independent refinery or financing the purchase of independent refineries therefore acquired by the fund under the provisions of this Act. Sets forth procedures to be followed in case of default of obligations guaranteed under this Act. Establishes penalties for fraudulently obtained or renewed guarantees under this Act. Authorizes to be appropriated the sum of $10,000,000 and such further sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a program of loan guarantee to enable independent refiners of crude oil to construct or acquire new or expanded refining facilities in the United States.
